problem_text_cn: 如图,利用标杆BE测量建筑物的高度,标杆BE高1.5m,测得AB=2m,BC=14m,则楼高CD为()m．
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the height of the building is measured with the benchmark BE. The height of the benchmark BE is N_0, and the measured AB = N_1, BC = N_2, then the building height CD is ().
raw_comment: 本题考查的是相似三角形的应用,熟知相似三角形的对应边成比例的性质是解答此题的关键．
